product_sketch: A trauma-aware productivity app that helps users build sustainable, compassionate work habits through gentle nudges, energy awareness, and boundary support. The app adapts to individual trauma responses and provides personalized strategies for managing overwhelm, perfectionism, and burnout.

problem_hypotheses.label: Overwhelm Regulation
problem_hypotheses.description: Users struggle to manage overwhelming workloads and emotional responses to stress

problem_hypotheses.label: Trauma-Aware Productivity
problem_hypotheses.description: Users need productivity tools that don't trigger trauma responses or shame

problem_hypotheses.label: Energy Awareness and Boundary Support
problem_hypotheses.description: Users need help recognizing their energy levels and setting healthy boundaries

problem_hypotheses.label: Values-Based Growth Nudges
problem_hypotheses.description: Users want to grow and develop while staying aligned with their core values

problem_hypotheses.label: Peak-State Reflection and Momentum
problem_hypotheses.description: Users want to capture and build on their peak performance moments
